casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sylvester Eugene HARDING, III. No. 402P11-8. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Jonathan Shaw, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sylvester Eugene Harding, Wilmington, for Harding, Sylvester Eugene. *177William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of April 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Extraordinary Writ as to the All Writ Act of 1789:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
